all_questions.question: What is the process called when decomposing trees into smaller treelets?
all_questions.context: You decompose these trees into smaller treelets

all_questions.question: What do you end up with after decomposing the trees?
How can you use the extracted treelets to build a target sentence?
all_questions.context: So you will have like a dictionary of treelets and you can use the substitution grammars

all_questions.question: What are the two sides that the treelets will be used on?
all_questions.context: to synchronously use these treelets on the source side and target side

all_questions.question: What is the goal of using the substitution grammars with the extracted treelets?
all_questions.context: and cover the source sentence and build the target sentence
